article_node.title: Iran to hold call with European nations over nuclear program as sanctions deadline draws closer
article_node.summary: Iran's Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi is set to hold a conference call with his counterparts from France, Germany, and the UK to discuss the potential reimposition of UN sanctions over its nuclear program, as the deadline approaches on August 31. The call comes amid heightened concerns from European nations regarding Iran's uranium enrichment activities, which have escalated following the recent Iran-Israel conflict. The situation is complicated by Iran's cessation of cooperation with the International Atomic Energy Agency and threats against its director-general, Rafael Mariano Grossi.
